tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE student_behavior (
    behavior_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT REFERENCES students(student_id),
    behavior_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    behavior_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(50),
    student_email VARCHAR(100),
    class_id INT,
    enrollment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interventions (
    intervention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    intervention_date DATE,
    intervention_type VARCHAR(50),
    intervention_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(50),
    student_age INT,
    student_grade VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Courses (
    course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_name VARCHAR(50),
    course_description TEXT,
    course_teacher VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    assignment_title VARCHAR(100),
    assignment_due_date DATE,
    assignment_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE BehaviorLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(20),
    behavior_description TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Courses (
    course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_name VARCHAR(50),
    course_description TEXT,
    course_start_date DATE,
    course_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    assignment_name VARCHAR(50),
    assignment_due_date DATE,
    total_points INT
);

CREATE TABLE Grades (
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    assignment_id INT,
    grade INT,
    submission_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (student_id, course_id, assignment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
